name: Empeopled Slim
description:
A slimmed down Empeopled for people that don't like to only view two items at a time.

Now with Dark Mode!
additional_info:
<dl>
  <dt>0.3.0</dt>
  <dd>Slim styles restricted to non-mobile.  Dark mode still works everywhere.</dd>
  <dt>0.2.7</dt>
  <dd>Try to fix the live XP popup's contrast issues in Dark Mode</dd>
  <dt>0.2.6</dt>
  <dd>Fix dark theme on notifications page</dd>
  <dt>0.2.5</dt>
  <dd>Slimmed down the new topic voting list</dd>
  <dt>0.2.4</dt>
  <dd>Consolidated Styles and darkened comment box in Dark Mode</dd>
  <dt>0.2.3</dt>
  <dd>Additional tweaks to improve Dark Mode</dd>
  <dt>0.2.2</dt>
  <dd>Fix Profile page in Dark Mode</dd>
  <dt>0.2.1</dt>
  <dd>Few tweaks to Dark theme to fix missed elements</dd>
  <dt>0.2.0</dt>
  <dd>Added optional Dark color scheme</dd>
  <dt>0.1.3</dt>
  <dd>Don't mess with .actions on discussion pages</dd>
  <dt>0.1.2</dt>
  <dd>Slimmed down the list on the Govern page</dd>
  <dt>0.1.1</dt>
  <dd>Fixed .media-image-wrapper being too large.</dt>
  <dt>Initial Release - 0.1.0</dt>
  <dd>Slimmed down 'Posts' and 'Future' in list view.</dd>
</dl>

style_setting_options.label: Dark
